item.name: 1 = Alpha Anywhere displays a confirmation dialog after the new record is created.
2 = Alpha Anywhere does not display a confirmation dialog.
Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.DUPLICATE_RECORD() method creates a new record that is a duplicate of the current record and then moves focus to the new record. The method returns the number of the new record. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script which is attached to a button on a form duplicates the current record:
